title: ICYMI - Trevor's April 4, 2020, Interview with Then-Presidential Candidate Bernie Sanders
itunes:title: ICYMI - Trevor's April 4, 2020, Interview with Then-Presidential Candidate Bernie Sanders
description:
Senator Bernie Sanders talks about his emergence as the 2020 Democratic presidential front-runner, fighting for single-payer health care and tackling income inequality.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
